description.zh-cn: 越南的执政党，也是目前越南唯一的合法政党。其前身为越南劳动党，于1976年改称现名。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of Vietnam, and currently the only legal political party in the country. Its predecessor was the Labour Party of Vietnam, and it was renamed to its current name in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产主义革命家，越南共产党、越南民主共和国和越南人民军的主要创立者和领导人。
description.en: A Vietnamese communist revolutionary, the main founder and leader of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Democratic Republic of Vietnam, and the People's Army of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 由胡志明在香港整合越南的三个共产主义组织后成立，最初名为越南共产党，后改称印度支那共产党。1951年解散并分为三个国家的党派。
description.en: Founded by Ho Chi Minh in Hong Kong by consolidating three communist organizations in Vietnam, initially named the Communist Party of Vietnam and later renamed the Indochinese Communist Party. It was dissolved in 1951 and split into parties for three separate countries.

description.zh-cn: 1920年代末在越南北部出现的三个共产主义组织之一，后于1930年合并成立印度支那共产党。
description.en: One of the three communist organizations that emerged in northern Vietnam in the late 1920s, which later merged to form the Indochinese Communist Party in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 1920年代末在越南中部出现的三个共产主义组织之一，后于1930年合并成立印度支那共产党。
description.en: One of the three communist organizations that emerged in central Vietnam in the late 1920s, which later merged to form the Indochinese Communist Party in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 1920年代末在越南南部出现的三个共产主义组织之一，后于1930年合并成立印度支那共产党。
description.en: One of the three communist organizations that emerged in southern Vietnam in the late 1920s, which later merged to form the Indochinese Communist Party in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一个特别行政区，印度支那共产党的成立地点。
description.en: A special administrative region of China, and the founding place of the Indochinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1951年印度支那共产党解散后，代表越南的部分成立的政党。1976年越南统一后，改名为越南共产党。
description.en: The party formed to represent the Vietnamese contingent after the dissolution of the Indochinese Communist Party in 1951. After the reunification of Vietnam in 1976, it was renamed the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东提出的一系列政治和军事思想，曾在1951年至1960年期间被越南劳动党列为指导思想。
description.en: A series of political and military ideologies put forward by Mao Zedong, which were adopted as a guiding ideology by the Worker's Party of Vietnam from 1951 to 1960.

description.zh-cn: 由胡志明提出并由越南共产党发展的思想体系，自1991年起成为越南共产党的指导思想之一。
description.en: An ideological system developed from the ideas of Ho Chi Minh and the Communist Party of Vietnam, which has been one of the party's guiding ideologies since 1991.

description.zh-cn: 1986年由越南共产党第六次全国代表大会确立的经济改革政策，旨在建立社会主义定向的市场经济。
description.en: An economic reform policy established by the 6th National Congress of the Communist Party of Vietnam in 1986, aimed at creating a socialist-oriented market economy.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，在1986年越共六大上当选为总书记，是“革新开放”政策的主要推动者。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who was elected General Secretary at the 6th Party Congress in 1986 and was a key promoter of the 'Đổi Mới' policy.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，自2011年起长期担任越共中央总书记，任内发起大规模反腐败运动。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who served as the General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam for a long term starting in 2011 and launched a large-scale anti-corruption campaign during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 由越共中央总书记阮富仲发起的全国性反腐败行动，导致多名高级官员下台。
description.en: A nationwide anti-corruption campaign initiated by CPV General Secretary Nguyễn Phú Trọng, which has led to the downfall of numerous high-ranking officials.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，曾任越南国家主席，后因反腐败运动而被迫辞职。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who served as the President of Vietnam and was later forced to resign due to the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，曾任越南国家主席，后因反腐败运动而被迫辞职。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who served as the President of Vietnam and was later forced to resign due to the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，曾任越南国会主席，后因反腐败运动而被迫辞职。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who served as the Chairman of the National Assembly of Vietnam and was later forced to resign due to the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，曾任越共中央书记处常务书记，后因反腐败运动而被迫辞职。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who served as the Permanent Member of the Secretariat of the CPV Central Committee and was later forced to resign due to the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，在阮富仲去世后，于2024年8月当选为越共中央总书记。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who was elected as the General Secretary of the CPV Central Committee in August 2024, following the death of Nguyễn Phú Trọng.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国的武装力量，由越南共产党统一、直接和全面领导。
description.en: The armed forces of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, under the unified, direct, and comprehensive leadership of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，胡志明去世后越南劳动党和越南共产党的最高领导人，直至1986年去世。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who became the paramount leader of the Worker's Party and Communist Party of Vietnam after Ho Chi Minh's death, serving until his own death in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 胡志明以共产国际代表的身份在香港召集会议，将越南的三个共产主义组织合并为越南共产党，该党后于1930年10月改名为印度支那共产党。
description.en: As a representative of the Comintern, Ho Chi Minh convened a meeting in Hong Kong to merge three Vietnamese communist organizations into the Communist Party of Vietnam, which was later renamed the Indochinese Communist Party in October 1930.

description.zh-cn: 东洋共产党与另外两个组织合并，成立了印度支那共产党的前身。
description.en: The Indochinese Communist Party (1929) merged with two other organizations to form the predecessor of the Indochinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 东洋共产联团与另外两个组织合并，成立了印度支那共产党的前身。
description.en: The League of Indochinese Communists merged with two other organizations to form the predecessor of the Indochinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 安南共产党与另外两个组织合并，成立了印度支那共产党的前身。
description.en: The Annamese Communist Party merged with two other organizations to form the predecessor of the Indochinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1951年，印度支那共产党一分为三，其中代表越南的部分成立了越南劳动党。
description.en: In 1951, the Indochinese Communist Party was split into three, with the part representing Vietnam forming the Worker's Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1976年，越南劳动党第四次全国代表大会决定将党名更改为越南共产党。
description.en: In 1976, the 4th National Congress of the Worker's Party of Vietnam decided to change the party's name to the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1951年越南劳动党二大通过的党章，将毛泽东思想同马克思列宁主义并列，作为党的思想基础和一切行动的指针。
description.en: The party charter adopted at the 2nd Congress of the Worker's Party of Vietnam in 1951 listed Mao Zedong Thought alongside Marxism-Leninism as the ideological basis and guide for all actions of the party.

description.zh-cn: 自1991年越共七大起，胡志明思想与马克思列宁主义并列为越南共产党的指导思想。
description.en: Since the 7th Party Congress in 1991, Ho Chi Minh Thought has been established alongside Marxism-Leninism as the guiding ideology of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1986年12月，越南共产党第六次全国代表大会确立了“革新开放”政策。
description.en: In December 1986, the 6th National Congress of the Communist Party of Vietnam established the 'Đổi Mới' policy.

position.en: General Secretary of the CPV Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 阮文灵在1986年当选为越共总书记后，成为推动“革新开放”政策的关键领导人。
description.en: After being elected as the General Secretary of the CPV in 1986, Nguyễn Văn Linh became a key leader in promoting the 'Đổi Mới' policy.

description.zh-cn: 越南人民军是越南的武装力量，由越南共产党进行统一、直接和全面的领导。
description.en: The People's Army of Vietnam is the armed forces of Vietnam, under the unified, direct, and comprehensive leadership of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

position.en: General Secretary of the CPV Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 阮富仲在其总书记任内发起了大规模的反腐败运动，导致多名高级领导干部下台。
description.en: During his tenure as General Secretary, Nguyễn Phú Trọng launched a large-scale anti-corruption campaign, leading to the downfall of several high-ranking officials.

description.zh-cn: 国家主席阮春福在反腐败运动期间被迫辞职。
description.en: President Nguyễn Xuân Phúc was forced to resign during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 国家主席武文赏在反腐败运动期间被迫辞职。
description.en: President Võ Văn Thưởng was forced to resign during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 国会主席王廷惠在反腐败运动期间被迫辞职。
description.en: National Assembly Chairman Vương Đình Huệ was forced to resign during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中央书记处常务书记张氏梅在反腐败运动期间被迫辞职。
description.en: Permanent Member of the Secretariat Trương Thị Mai was forced to resign during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在阮富仲去世后，苏林接替其职位，当选为新任越共中央总书记。
description.en: Following the death of Nguyễn Phú Trọng, Tô Lâm succeeded him and was elected as the new General Secretary of the CPV Central Committee.

position.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee
